title: Cheryl's by the Bay
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with romantic, eclectic decor and crooner vocal music wafting in the background. Has a vegetarian section with 4 or so entrees - sample dishes such as sweet curry with a variety of condiments from tamarind to coconut or mango chutney (can be vegan on request); a burrito; and dirty rice. Note that the complimentary appetizer is made with feta cheese and salads come with grated cheese (ask to omit).
